PetEgg.desc: Each purchase gives anywhere from 3 to 12 eggs in your item inventory! Use these eggs in your          inventory to refill your nest with eggs!              This item restocks each day.

GemQ12.desc: Gives you a random console chip. There are currently 22 Chips in the game, so you have a 1 in      22 chance of getting any particular chip.      This item restocks each week.

GemQ11.desc: Upgrades 1 kitchen, in order from first to last, to a Richelin Kitchen! These have 3x Meal Cooking Speed, 2x New Recipe Speed, and 40% Cheaper Upgrade Costs!

GemQ15.desc: Unlocks 12 pet storage spaces, which is an entire row!

GemQ10.desc: Boosts the max number of eggs in your breeding nest by +1. ALSO, as an added bonus, you get 1.10x New Pet Breeding Chance for each time you buy this!

GemQ13.desc: Gives you a random Jewel that you don't already    own. No need to worry about duplicate jewels!    This item restocks each week, unless you own all Jewels, then it wont restock.

GemQ16.desc: Unlocks 2 Fenceyard slots, which are great for Breedability Pets and Shiny Pets!

GemQ14.desc: Each purchase soups up 2 lab Tubes. Players in souped-up tubes get 2x Lab EXP gain, and +30% Line Width. Keep in mind, players are placed in tubes in chronological order.

GemQ17.desc: Use this on a 3 star card to upgrade it to 4 stars! You can use it on any 3 star card you have, it's up to you! Each purchase allows for one card of your choice to be upgraded.

desc: Gives +6 extra Storage Chest Slots. Storage Chests are found in each town, and the items you put in can be access by all your players!
Gives +9 extra Storage Chest Slots! Storage Chests are found in each town, and the items you put in are shared by all your players!
Gives +4 extra Item Slots for your backpack. Applies to all your characters, even ones you haven't made yet!
Gives +4 extra Item Slots for your backpack! Applies to all your characters, even ones you haven't made yet!
